author: yperbasis
content: I'm a bit confused which EIPs go into fusaka-devnet-0. https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/fusaka-devnet-0 says EIP-7883, while https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7607 has EIP-7823 & EIP-7892 CFI'ed. I thought we agreed to CFI & include into devnet-0 all 3 of them (7883, 7823, 7892).

author: barnabasbusa
content:
I have adjusted the notes with 7892. As far as I recall, we only decided to include 7883 modexp gas cost increase in devnet 0 and decided against 7823 for now, as said that we would include that in devnet-1, due to extra difficulty in implementation. 

So 
devnet 0 target:
7594
7823
7883
7892

~~Devnet 1 target: 
all of devnet 0 
+ 7823~~

author: yperbasis
content: <@412614104222531604> btw, the doc says "devnet-7" in the EIP List

author: barnabasbusa
content: fixed thanks

author: siladu
content: We have draft PRs of both modexp EIPs in besu, don't think 7823 upper bounds is more complicated than gas increase, maybe even easier, in besu at least.

author: barnabasbusa
content: I'm happy to also add 7823 to devnet-0 spec, if all ELs are on board tbh.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Lets add it, move a bit faster

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Axxelerate

author: closer__
content: yup, we are for including all modexp related changes in devnet 0

content: "7Set upper bounds for MODEXP"?

author: barnabasbusa
content: edited notes, now this is the goal for next monday

content: ~~it's clear to me that the benefits of EIP-7892 were overestimated and nuances have not been thoroughly discussed. there are two active ongoing threads rn <#1360267444911865876> & <#1360292816235925605>.  if we do not manage to reach some form of consensus on 7892 and discuss the implications of it for the CLs, i suggest taking it out of devnet 0~~ resolved

author: nc1234
content: If we add 7892 to devnet 0, we most likely need another consensus spec release since https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4277 is not included in v1.5.0

author: nc1234
content: Looks like https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4316 v1.6.0-alpha.0 is scheduled to be released tomorrow. I presume this will be the version we are targeting for devnet 0. If so, we can update the target version in https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/fusaka-devnet-0

author: barnabasbusa
content: updated
